title: Obama Offers to Meet with Nevda Governor, but the Gov Refuses Invite

content: Aren't you the one who said he shouldn't meet the President, but should raise any concerns through Senator Reid? "....Let the governor tell his problem to his Senator, Harry Reid, and the Senator will relay the info to the President...." "....The guy just wants face time with the president and the press so he can make points with his constituency. If the governor wants to get an important message to the Governor(EDIT: You meant President, Jack), Senator Reid will do it for him. ...." Now your criticizing him for doing what you said 0bama shouldnt meet him? ""“While I appreciate the offer, I am not interested in a handshake and a hello from President 0bama, I am interested in an apology and plan to undo the damage the President did,” Gibbons said in a statement posted on his Web site. The “damage” Gibbons is referring to is a remark 0bama made in February during a town hall event on the economy in Indiana, where he said, “You can’t get corporate jets. You can’t go take a trip to Las Vegas or go down to the Super Bowl on the taxpayer’s dime.” Gibbons blames 0bama’s comment for hundreds of cancellations of conventions and business meetings in Vegas. "" 0bama doesnt care about the Citizens of the State of Nevada? Its a Laughing matter? Says wonders about certain people

content: quote: Originally posted by jack_flats: "http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0509/22935.html" I'm sure the President is all broken up over it ... lol He will be all broken up when the Democrats loose in Nevada. I doubt that the voters there are pleased with the sort of change that has been inflicted upon them. In reality Obama did single out Vegas in his attack on waste and the consequence has been a reluctance for groups to book conferences there. Of course the conferences are still held, either in Orlando, Branson. Atlantic City or some other location and the same money will be spent, only not in Vegas. The governor has every reason in the world to be very angry with the shortsighted words of the president.
quote: Originally posted by jack_flats: "http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0509/22935.html" I'm sure the President is all broken up over it ... lol
reply: He will be all broken up when the Democrats loose in Nevada. I doubt that the voters there are pleased with the sort of change that has been inflicted upon them. In reality Obama did single out Vegas in his attack on waste and the consequence has been a reluctance for groups to book conferences there. Of course the conferences are still held, either in Orlando, Branson. Atlantic City or some other location and the same money will be spent, only not in Vegas. The governor has every reason in the world to be very angry with the shortsighted words of the president.
